00019 class QwtPanner::PrivateData
00020 {
00021 public:
00022     PrivateData():
00023         isEnabled(false),
00024         button(Qt::LeftButton),
00025         buttonState(Qt::NoButton),
00026         abortKey(Qt::Key_Escape),
00027         abortKeyState(Qt::NoButton)
00028     {
00029     }
00030         
00031     bool isEnabled;
00032     int button;
00033     int buttonState;
00034     int abortKey;
00035     int abortKeyState;
00036 
00037     QPoint initialPos;
00038     QPoint pos;
00039 
00040     QPixmap pixmap;
00041     QCursor cursor;
00042 };

00049 QwtPanner::QwtPanner(QWidget *parent):
00050     QWidget(parent)
00051 {
00052     d_data = new PrivateData();
00053 
00054     if ( parent )
00055         d_data->cursor = parent->cursor();
00056 
00057 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00058     setAttribute(Qt::WA_TransparentForMouseEvents);
00059     setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoSystemBackground);
00060     setAttribute(Qt::WA_PaintOnScreen);
00061     setFocusPolicy(Qt::NoFocus);
00062 #else
00063     setBackgroundMode(Qt::NoBackground);
00064     setFocusPolicy(QWidget::NoFocus);
00065 #endif
00066     hide();
00067 
00068     setEnabled(true);
00069 }
00070 
00072 QwtPanner::~QwtPanner()
00073 {
00074     delete d_data;
00075 }

00132 
00142 void QwtPanner::setEnabled(bool on)
00143 {
00144     if ( d_data->isEnabled != on )
00145     {
00146         d_data->isEnabled = on;
00147 
00148         QWidget *w = parentWidget();
00149         if ( w )
00150         {
00151             if ( d_data->isEnabled )
00152             {
00153                 w->installEventFilter(this);
00154             }
00155             else
00156             {
00157                 w->removeEventFilter(this);
00158                 hide();
00159             }
00160         }
00161     }
00162 }
00163 
00168 bool QwtPanner::isEnabled() const
00169 {
00170     return d_data->isEnabled;
00171 }
00172 
00181 void QwtPanner::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *pe)
00182 {
00183     QPixmap pm(size());
00184 
00185     QPainter painter(&pm);
00186 
00187     const QColor bg =
00188 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00189         parentWidget()->palette().color(
00190             QPalette::Normal, QColorGroup::Background);
00191 #else
00192         parentWidget()->palette().color(
00193             QPalette::Normal, QPalette::Background);
00194 #endif
00195 
00196     painter.setPen(Qt::NoPen);
00197     painter.setBrush(QBrush(bg));
00198     painter.drawRect(0, 0, pm.width(), pm.height());
00199 
00200     int dx = d_data->pos.x() - d_data->initialPos.x();
00201     int dy = d_data->pos.y() - d_data->initialPos.y();
00202 
00203     QRect r(0, 0, d_data->pixmap.width(), d_data->pixmap.height());
00204     r.moveCenter(QPoint(r.center().x() + dx, r.center().y() + dy));
00205 
00206     painter.drawPixmap(r, d_data->pixmap);
00207     painter.end();
00208 
00209     painter.begin(this);
00210     painter.setClipRegion(pe->region());
00211     painter.drawPixmap(0, 0, pm);
00212 }
00213 
00222 bool QwtPanner::eventFilter(QObject *o, QEvent *e)
00223 {
00224     if ( o == NULL || o != parentWidget() )
00225         return false;
00226 
00227     switch(e->type())
00228     {
00229         case QEvent::MouseButtonPress:
00230         {
00231             widgetMousePressEvent((QMouseEvent *)e);
00232             break;
00233         }
00234         case QEvent::MouseMove:
00235         {
00236             widgetMouseMoveEvent((QMouseEvent *)e);
00237             break;
00238         }
00239         case QEvent::MouseButtonRelease:
00240         {
00241             widgetMouseReleaseEvent((QMouseEvent *)e);
00242             break;
00243         }
00244         case QEvent::KeyPress:
00245         {
00246             widgetKeyPressEvent((QKeyEvent *)e);
00247             break;
00248         }
00249         case QEvent::KeyRelease:
00250         {
00251             widgetKeyReleaseEvent((QKeyEvent *)e);
00252             break;
00253         }
00254         default:;
00255     }
00256 
00257     return false;
00258 }
00259 
00266 void QwtPanner::widgetMousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *me)
00267 {
00268     if ( me->button() != d_data->button )
00269         return;
00270 
00271 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00272     if ( (me->state() & Qt::KeyButtonMask) !=
00273         (d_data->buttonState & Qt::KeyButtonMask) )
00274 #else
00275     if ( (me->modifiers() & Qt::KeyboardModifierMask) !=
00276         (int)(d_data->buttonState & Qt::KeyboardModifierMask) )
00277 #endif
00278     {
00279         return;
00280     }
00281 
00282     parentWidget()->setCursor(d_data->cursor);
00283 
00284     d_data->initialPos = d_data->pos = me->pos();
00285 
00286     QRect cr = parentWidget()->rect();
00287     if ( parentWidget()->inherits("QFrame") )
00288     {
00289         const QFrame* frame = (QFrame*)parentWidget();
00290         cr = frame->contentsRect();
00291     }
00292     setGeometry(cr);
00293     d_data->pixmap = QPixmap::grabWidget(parentWidget(),
00294         cr.x(), cr.y(), cr.width(), cr.height());
00295     show();
00296 }
00297 
00304 void QwtPanner::widgetMouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *me)
00305 {
00306     if ( isVisible() && rect().contains(me->pos()) )
00307     {
00308         d_data->pos = me->pos();
00309         update();
00310 
00311         emit moved(d_data->pos.x() - d_data->initialPos.x(), 
00312             d_data->pos.y() - d_data->initialPos.y());
00313     }
00314 }
00315 
00321 void QwtPanner::widgetMouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *me)
00322 {
00323     if ( isVisible() )
00324     {
00325         hide();
00326         parentWidget()->unsetCursor();
00327 
00328         d_data->pixmap = QPixmap();
00329         d_data->pos = me->pos();
00330 
00331         if ( d_data->pos != d_data->initialPos )
00332         {
00333             emit panned(d_data->pos.x() - d_data->initialPos.x(), 
00334                 d_data->pos.y() - d_data->initialPos.y());
00335         }
00336     }
00337 }
00338 
00339 void QwtPanner::widgetKeyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *ke)
00340 {
00341     if ( ke->key() == d_data->abortKey )
00342     {
00343         const bool matched =
00344 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00345             (ke->state() & Qt::KeyButtonMask) ==
00346                 (d_data->abortKeyState & Qt::KeyButtonMask);
00347 #else
00348             (ke->modifiers() & Qt::KeyboardModifierMask) ==
00349                 (int)(d_data->abortKeyState & Qt::KeyboardModifierMask);
00350 #endif
00351         if ( matched )
00352         {
00353             hide();
00354             parentWidget()->unsetCursor();
00355             d_data->pixmap = QPixmap();
00356         }
00357     }
00358 }
00359 
00360 void QwtPanner::widgetKeyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *)
00361 {
00362 }
